Fold | San Mateo, CA | Software Engineer | ONSITE & REMOTE | Full-time | $120k-180k with equity

Fold is a cryptocurrency company backed by a number of well-known investors in the space.

We have opportunities across our flagship payment product, working to implement Lightning and build a cross-currency checkout process, and with Keep (https://keep.network), a new project built on Ethereum that adds a privacy layer to the public blockchain.

Crypto and Python, Clojure, or Go experience are great, but a critical eye and willingness to master new technologies are the real requirements. We embrace remote work, and our team hails from all over.

If you are looking for the right opportunity to break into the cryptocurrency space, email work at foldapp.com.
